tickets.subject: Computer Order Issue
tickets.description: Hi, my name is Claude and I placed an order for 3 supercomputers on June 13th. The tracking portal says they were delivered to 123 Front Street, but I never received the shipping containers. Can I please have a refund?

tickets.subject: Exchange Graphics Card
tickets.description: Hello, my name is Ada and I purchased a graphics card on July 9th, 2023. Unfortunately I ordered the wrong card for my machine. Can I exchange the card? I can be reached at ada@gmail.com and +18185552222

tickets.subject: Laptop Key Broken
tickets.description: Hi, I ordered a laptop three weeks ago on my credit card 4242 4242 4242 4242 and the U key is not working. I would like to order a replacement and have it sent to 456 Back Lane.
